bibl.title: Using Ostraca in the Ancient World New Discoveries and Methodologies
bibl.seg: Clementina Caputo & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Using Ostraca in the Ancient World. New Discoveries and Methodologies = Materiale Textkulturen. 32.
Berlin - Boston, W. de Gruyter, 2020, vi-245 pp. ISBN 978-3-11-071286-5. €79,95.

Nine papers from an international conference in Heidelberg from 12-14 October 2017, Using Ostraca in the Ancient World: New Discoveries and Methodologies. - Pp. 1-8: Cl.C. & J.L., Introduction. - 1. Documentation and interpretation of ostraca as archaeological objects. - 2. Cultural contexts and practices. - 3. Ostraca in context: case studies. - Indices.
C.R. par Sofía Torallas Tovar, BMCRev < https://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2021/2021.07.38 >.
